EmailTemplate.name: User Groups.China UG April
EmailTemplate.subject: Java/Spring User Group in Beijing: April 12th
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {Recipient Name}, 亲爱的中国Spring开发者们
2004年3月Spring Framework 1.0 Release发布，弹指一挥间十年过去了。这十年来曾经玩过Spring的小伙伴们，你们在哪里？
我们终于来了！！！由Spring官方团队发起的 Spring中国用户组线下活动首次亮相，Pivotal公司 <http://www.gopivotal.com/>（Spring、Cloud Foundry、Redis、RabbitMQ、OpenChorus等开源项目背后的公司）鼎力支持。
为小伙伴们提供高价值的技术实践分享是我们的目标，因此我 们提供了Spring以及开发部署延伸（例如Redis、Cloud Foundry）的5大技术主题，期待您的参与。
线下活动时间是4月12日(周六)下午2点，地点是北京市 东直门国华投资大厦11层，ThoughtWorks公司。 演讲者和主题：https://github.com/spring-ug/beijing/wiki <https://github.com/spring-ug/beijing/wiki>
如果您想参加活动，请从如下地址注册报名。非常欢迎分享链 接给您的小伙伴们。 https://yoopay.cn/event/58458792 <https://yoopay.cn/event/58458792>
为了能给小伙伴提供更好的服务，我们同时发起QQ群（群号 264930871）、论坛（http://spring-ug.github.io <http://spring-ug.github.io/>）、微信群（活动现场 加入）等交流。
如果您想申请成为演讲者，请发邮件给paul.verest@live.com <mailto:paul.verest@live.com>或lostitle@gmail.com <mailto:lostitle@gmail.com>。
如果您有建议（例如期待在您所在的城市、活动形式等），请 在如下网址发帖(New Issue): https://github.com/spring-ug/spring-ug.github.io/issues/ <https://github.com/spring-ug/spring-ug.github.io/issues/>
本次活动演讲者列表:
- 白小勇（Mike Bai） software architect，用友软件，http://git.oschina.net/quickbundle <http://git.oschina.net/quickbundle> PaaS混合云、数据安全技术、快速应用开发平台 - Paul Verest (伟保罗), software architect, 5 languages, experience in oil and finance industries. 风行网 <http://www.funshion.com/>， 北京JUG， Eclipse 中国 <http://eclipse-china.github.io/>，Nodeclipse <http://www.nodeclipse.org/>, Enide Studio <http://marketplace.eclipse.org/content/enide-studio-2014/> - Baruch Sadogursky (a.k.a JBaruch) is the Developer Advocate of JFrog, the creators of Artifactory Binary Repository, the home of Bintray, JavaOne 2011 and 2013 Duke Choice Awards winner. - 薛正华，博士，用友集团资深技术专家，助理总裁。中 国计算机学会高级会员，大数据专委会委员，原中科院副研究员。近十年一直专注于大规模计算系统、并行计算和大数据工作。
- 贾朝阳，ThoughtWorks开发，帮助客户落 地敏捷实践，加入ThoughtWorks之前曾就职久其软件。多年的项目开发经验，熟悉多种语言和工具，当前在Telstra Identity 项目。 Jia Chaoyang ThoughtWorks, Developer. Enabling agile practices for customers. Currently, working in Telstra Identity project.
最新的日程安排会被实时更新到https://github.com/spring-ug/beijing/wiki <https://github.com/spring-ug/beijing/wiki> <https://github.com/spring-ug/beijing/wiki/email#dear-spring-developers-in-china> Dear Spring Developers in China
Pivotal <http://www.gopivotal.com/>, the newly combined company to drive Spring and other open-source projects, is looking for local Java/Spring User Groups in China and helping to organize events, facilitate communication via WeiXin, QQ, forums etc.
QQ group is 264930871. http://spring-ug.github.io <http://spring-ug.github.io/>
The first event is to be in Beijing on April 12th. If you live in other city and want such event, raise an issue or add +1 onhttps://github.com/spring-ug/spring-ug.github.io/issues/ <https://github.com/spring-ug/spring-ug.github.io/issues/>
There are already seven speakers. https://github.com/spring-ug/beijing/wiki <https://github.com/spring-ug/beijing/wiki> Sign up as speaker or just guest and tell your friends. Register onhttps://yoopay.cn/event/58458792 <https://yoopay.cn/event/58458792> 这里报名。
Expected presenters:
- 白小勇（Mike Bai） software architect，用友软件，http://git.oschina.net/quickbundle <http://git.oschina.net/quickbundle> PaaS混合云、数据安全技术、快速应用开发平台 - Paul Verest (伟保罗), software architect, 5 languages, experience in oil and finance industries. 风行网 <http://www.funshion.com/>， 北京JUG， Eclipse 中国 <http://eclipse-china.github.io/>，Nodeclipse <http://www.nodeclipse.org/>, Enide Studio <http://marketplace.eclipse.org/content/enide-studio-2014/> - Baruch Sadogursky (a.k.a JBaruch) is the Developer Advocate of JFrog, the creators of Artifactory Binary Repository, the home of Bintray, JavaOne 2011 and 2013 Duke Choice Awards winner. - 薛正华，博士，用友集团资深技术专家，助理总裁。中 国计算机学会高级会员，大数据专委会委员，原中科院副研究员。近十年一直专注于大规模计算系统、并行计算和大数据工作。
- 贾朝阳，ThoughtWorks开发，帮助客户落 地敏捷实践，加入ThoughtWorks之前曾就职久其软件。多年的项目开发经验，熟悉多种语言和工具，当前在Telstra Identity 项目。 Jia Chaoyang ThoughtWorks, Developer. Enabling agile practices for customers. Currently, working in Telstra Identity project.
